trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> elements that identify an item of content.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements defined in a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> provides a structured means to reference an external data item.
The process of resolving each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> in sequence provides the context to resolve the next <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> class.
Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was `true.`

When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or the current animation values.
A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
Always returns `null`.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.GetSchema%2A> method is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
Always `null`.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> collection returned will never be `null`.
If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> from a specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
The XML reader to use to deserialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
reader is `null`.
The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> is not valid.

Returns a value that indicates whether the starting sequence of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> elements in a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> are identical to those in this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.

<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> returns `true` the starting sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements in this <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> matches those in the specified `locator`.

<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> returns `false` if the specified `locator` contains <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements that are different, in a different order, or more than in this <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> with the list of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> elements to compare with this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
`true` if the starting sequence of elements in this matches those in the specified locator; otherwise, `false`.
locator is `null`.
Serializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The XML writer to use to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref>.
writer is `null`.
